mapper.select: SELECT l.id, l.ad_id as adId, l.action_dkcode, c.bid, concat(l.event_type) as eventType, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(concat(FROM_UNIXTIME(l.dateline,'%Y%m'),'01')) as dateline FROM ad_log l,ad_cost c WHERE l.ad_id=c.ad_id AND l.is_user = 1 AND l.action_dkcode != 0 AND l.is_income = 0 AND ( (c.charge_mode = 'CPM' and l.event_type = 1) or (c.charge_mode = 'CPC' and l.event_type = 2) or (c.charge_mode = 'FANS' and l.event_type = 3) )
select ad_id as adId, cid, url, ip, event_type as eventType, url, is_user as isUser, action_dkcode as actionDkcode from ad_log where ad_id = #{adId}

select (select count(1) from ad_log where event_type=1) as showCount, (select count(1) from ad_log where event_type=2) as clickCount, (select count(1) from ad_log where event_type=3) as fansCount from ad_log l limit 1

select l.ad_id as adId, l.action_dkcode as dkcode, (select count(1) from ad_log where event_type=1 and ad_id=l.ad_id and action_dkcode=l.action_dkcode) as showCount, (select count(1) from ad_log where event_type=2 and ad_id=l.ad_id and action_dkcode=l.action_dkcode) as clickCount, (select count(1) from ad_log where event_type=3 and ad_id=l.ad_id and action_dkcode=l.action_dkcode) as fansCount from ad_log l where is_user = 1 and action_dkcode != 0 group by l.ad_id,l.action_dkcode

select l.ad_id as adId, (select count(1) from ad_log where event_type=1 and ad_id=l.ad_id and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(FROM_UNIXTIME(dateline,'%Y%m%d'))=UNIX_TIMESTAMP(FROM_UNIXTIME(l.dateline, '%Y%m%d'))) as showCount, (select count(1) from ad_log where event_type=2 and ad_id=l.ad_id and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(FROM_UNIXTIME(dateline,'%Y%m%d'))=UNIX_TIMESTAMP(FROM_UNIXTIME(l.dateline, '%Y%m%d'))) as clickCount, (select count(1) from ad_log where event_type=3 and ad_id=l.ad_id and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(FROM_UNIXTIME(dateline,'%Y%m%d'))=UNIX_TIMESTAMP(FROM_UNIXTIME(l.dateline, '%Y%m%d'))) as fansCount, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(FROM_UNIXTIME(l.dateline, '%Y%m%d')) as dateline from ad_log l where 1=1 group by l.ad_id, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(FROM_UNIXTIME(l.dateline, '%Y%m%d'))
mapper.update: UPDATE ad_log l,ad_cost c set l.is_income = 1 WHERE l.ad_id=c.ad_id AND l.is_user = 1 AND l.action_dkcode != 0 AND l.is_income = 0 AND ( (c.charge_mode = 'CPM' and l.event_type = 1) or (c.charge_mode = 'CPC' and l.event_type = 2) or (c.charge_mode = 'FANS' and l.event_type = 3) )

UPDATE ad_log l,ad_cost c SET l.is_income = 0 WHERE l.ad_id=c.ad_id AND l.is_user = 1 AND l.action_dkcode != 0 AND l.is_income = 1 AND ( (c.charge_mode = 'CPM' and l.event_type = 1) or (c.charge_mode = 'CPC' and l.event_type = 2) or (c.charge_mode = 'FANS' and l.event_type = 3) )
